summary: A plumber parked his van and took his tools into an apartment house. Only one person on the eleventh floor knew the plumber was actually a detective. Paul, a resident, suspected his neighbor of dishonesty due to recent strange occurrences. Two residents, Miss Franklin and Fred Carson, had items stolen from their apartments. Paul was trying to understand what was happening in the apartment house.
quotes: there was something going on that he did not understand
many peculiar things had happened recently
